import '../styles/Footer.css'; import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { FaFacebook, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Button, Grid, makeStyles, TextField, Typography } from '@material-ui/core'; import { Facebook, Instagram, LinkedIn } from '@material-ui/icons'; const useStyles = makeStyles((theme) => ({ root: { background: 'rgb(17, 89, 122)', }, logo: { color: 'rgb(214, 190, 207)', textDecoration: 'none', display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column', fontFamily: 'Verdana', fontWeight: 'bold', fontSize: '20px', paddingTop: '25px', paddingLeft: '50px', paddingBottom: '10px', }, links: { color: 'rgb(214, 190, 207)', textDecoration: 'none', fontFamily: 'Verdana', fontSize: '10px', paddingLeft: '50px', }, icons: { paddingTop: '20px', paddingLeft: '50px', paddingBottom: '30px', color: 'white', paddingRight: '5px', }, newsletter_head: { fontSize: '23px', color: 'white', textAlign: 'right', paddingTop: '20px', paddingRight: '50px', }, input: { marginTop: '5px', marginRight: '5px', height: '20px', width: '150px', paddingRight: '50px', textAlign: 'right', }, })); function Footer() { const classes = useStyles(); return( <> Becoming
